Tax052.description: Tax052 program extracts data from /tax/bin/taxbatch.txt and inserts it into the data collection tables
Tax052.process: Operations runs the program each business day at 07:30AM.The batch date is the system date of the run. The batch number is 1.
Tax052.prints:
• TAX052.YYYYMonDD.HHMMSS.01 TXP001
  • Operations prints the error report directly from Linux to a printer at Income Tax.
